ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who has purified himself will have success,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely he will succeed who grows in goodness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He who purified himself shall prosper,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lasting happiness will be for those who purify themselves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed successful is the one who became pure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Indeed whosoever purifies himself shall achieve success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He indeed shall be successful who purifies himself,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Prosperous is he who has cleansed himself,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He indeed hath attained bliss who hath cleansed himself,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But those will prosper who purify themselves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Indeed whosoever purifies himself (by avoiding polytheism and accepting Islamic Monotheism) shall achieve success,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Prosperous is he who purifies himself,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Successful is he who purifies himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:14] Successful, winner, indeed is he who purifies himself, [who] cleanses himself by means of [his adherence to]   faith,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He is successful) and saved (who groweth) he who takes admonition by means of the Qur'an and believes in Allah's divine Oneness,
